deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Unit 1, Kings Court, Little King Street

summary.gco:CharacterString: Satellite Derived Land Cover (LC) dataset. Sensor: Sentinel 2 MMU: 400 sq m Scale: 1:25,000 Coordinate System: British National Grid (EPSG:27700) Schema: Adapted from CORINE Land Cover, Copyright 4 Earth Intelligence Ltd File Type: ESRI Shapefile

abstract.gco:CharacterString: Satellite Derived Land Cover (LC) data can be created on either an image by image basis or from a mosaic of images that are close in date. The schema used is adapted from CORINE Land Cover. Land cover is delivered as ESRI Shapefiles named after the location, sensor, acquisition date, product and the horizontal reference system of the data.

useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: Only to be used for data evaluation

statement.gco:CharacterString: The data is delivered with a minimum mapping unit of 400 square meters. Land cover is delivered as an ESRI Shapefile with 2 levels of classification and area attributed.
